fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Perfect Forgery (Infinite): Target a player or yourself. You may choose a role for them to appear as to both Town Investigatives and on death until the end of the next day. (if they die, their role remains framed in the graveyard)
~ Jack of All Trades (2-shot): Use any ability that an Agent existing in this round can use. If you are the last living Agent, you may instead use any 2+ shot Agent ability.
~ Identify Contact (1-shot): Choose a codeword. You will gain a permanent private chat with the Agent using that codeword.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ At game start, you will learn if any other faction heads or neutral killings are present, and if so, which.
~ You are detection-immune to abilities that determine alignment.
~ If you carry the factional kill, you will rampage.
